title: Senior Applications Engineer  - Vision Products Group
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. The Vision Products Group (VPG) is looking for a Senior Applications Engineer to help us push the limits on the next generation of interactive computing for our platform.
description: Apple makes the newest technologies accessible to create amazing user experiences. You will have the opportunity to develop prototypes at the bleeding edge of technology to find the best experiences for our products. We work closely with Apple's Human Interface design team to define the next generation of computing.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in software development. Passionate about great user experiences. Swift is the primary programming language on day to day basis. Proficiency in a programming language such as C, C++, Objective-C, big plus. Good intuition in making time vs. complexity tradeoffs. Experience building efficient systems software.
education_experience: BS / MS / PhD in Computer Science OR equivalent degree OR equivalent experience
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
